item.title: House Panel Passes GOP's Tax Package
item.description: The House Ways and Means Committee on Wednesday morning approved the tax package portion of Republicans' reconciliation legislation.

item.title: EPA's Zeldin Ending Cars' Start/Stop Tech: 'Everyone Hates It'
item.description: Environmental Protection Agency Administrator Lee Zeldin says the agency plans to eliminate start/stop technology in vehicles, as "everyone hates it."
